actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-538.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3932) to amend the Presidential Transition Act of 1963 to provide for a more orderly transfer of executive power in connection with the expiration of the term of office of a President.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3932 (presidential transitions).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3932) to amend the Presidential Transition Act of 1963 to provide for a more orderly transfer of executive power in connection with the expiration of the term of office of a President.
